clumpy.models.BootstrapPatchParams¶

class clumpy.models.BootstrapPatchParams(areas, eccentricities)[source]¶

Bases: clumpy.models._parameters._patch.PatchParams

Bootstrap patch parameters object.

Parameters

  • areas (array-like of shape (n_patches,)) – Array of areas.

  • eccentricities (array-like of shape (n_patches,)) – Array of eccentricities which correspond to areas.
